import { useState } from 'react'; import Link from "next/link"; import Image from 'next/image' import style from '../styles/Header.module.scss'; const Header = () => { const [megaMenu, setMegaMenu] = useState(false); setMegaMenu = () => { megaMenu = !megaMenu; } return (
Home About Mortgage Process Calculator FAQ Contact
) } export default Header;
